ComicInfo.Summary:
Night of the Voodoo Curse: Len Carver takes his cellmate's place when he is paroled.
Scream Along with Sammy: Someone is stalking Sam Chapman and threatening to kill him.
What Demon Dwells Within Me: Colonel Morrel finds an alien spacecraft and accidentally releases an interplanetary demon.
The Darkness Beyond: Michael Allison kills three women in an attempt to raise a demon.
The Dead Don't Cry: A mortician turns to robbing graves but is caught and killed by villagers.
The Harpies Are Coming!: Hector gets ESP after an industrial accident but only uses his powers to save the lives of those that can afford to pay for his service.
The Ouija's Omen: Sheriff Bufford kills Rosa after she refuses to date him.
Sing a Song of Sorcery: Lydell Billings asks the witch Matilda to kill his nemesis, Borst, so Lydell can become the greatest opera singer.
The Fine Art of Murder!: When Herr Spigel turns down Ludwig for the job of circus tattooed man, Ludwig flies into a rage and kills Spigel.
ComicInfo.Tags: Cynthia,The House of Secrets,Mildred,The Three Witches,Malibu,Abel,Harpies,Space,New Orleans,Mordred
